heading: Tuesday Night
text: Mostly cloudy, with patchy fog, and the chance of early drizzle, mainly northeast, and then the chance a sprinkle in the northern mountains late. Lows from the mid 40s to around 50, except upper 30s to mid 40s northeast and in the Adirondacks. Winds becoming west to northwest 5 to 10 mph.

heading: Wednesday
text: Mostly to partly cloudy, but still mostly cloudy northeast. Chance of a sprinkle in the northern mountains. Valley highs in the mid to upper 50s for southeastern valleys, and in the broad valleys west, otherwise upper 40s to mid 50s. North to northwest winds 5 to 10 mph, gusting to 20 mph.

heading: Wednesday Night
text: Mostly cloudy, except partly cloudy southeast, and in the St. Lawrence Valley. Lows from the mid 30s to lower 40s, with upper 20s to mid 30s northeast and in the Adirondacks. North winds 5 to 10 mph, gusting to 20 mph.
